## Perlin.noise1d() method

Generate a one-dimensional Perlin noise.

**Signature:**

```typescript
noise1d(x: number): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

x


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The position for generating one-dimensional Perlin noise.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

number

The Perlin noise value between -1 and 1.

## Example


```typescript
const perlin = new Perlin();
perlin.noise1d(123.4); // Return the noise value between -1 and 1.
```
